data.title: Bishop Blanchet High School
meta_keywords: Bishop Blanchet High School Bears Excellence Catholic education College prep Community involvement Academic rigor Sports programs the arts Leadership development
data.meta_description: Home - Bishop Blanchet High School is a Catholic, coed school located in the Green Lake neighborhood of Seattle.
data.text:
Bishop Blanchet High School boasts an exceptional academic program that prepares students for the rigors of college and beyond. The school offers a wide range of Advanced Placement (AP) and Honors courses, providing students with the opportunity to challenge themselves and explore subjects in greater depth.

The AP and Honors courses at BBHS are designed to cultivate critical thinking skills, encourage intellectual curiosity, and foster a love for learning. These courses not only provide students with a competitive edge in college admissions but also equip them with the knowledge and skills necessary for success in higher education. In addition to the rigorous coursework, Bishop Blanchet High School also offers comprehensive learning support services. Dedicated teachers and staff provide personalized assistance to students who may need extra help, ensuring that every student has access to the resources necessary to thrive academically.

How will you spend your time outside of class? Not only do we have 50+ student run clubs and activities, we have extra-curriculur opportunities in the arts, campus ministry and student leadership. Whether before school, after school, at lunch or in community period - groups of students with similar interests meet up when not in class, with their program moderator to connect and advance their goals. There truly is something for everyone, and we highly encourage students to be engaged both in the classroom and outside of the classroom, to have the most meaningful high school experience, as well as learning skills and preparing for their future.

At Bishop Blanchet, the emphasis on teamwork extends beyond the sport itself. Students are encouraged to support and celebrate their peers across different athletic programs, fostering a culture of unity and sportsmanship throughout the school. The collective spirit of teamwork serves as a driving force that not only enhances athletic performance but also strengthens the overall sense of community here at Bishop Blanchet High School.

Our teams consistently compete and excel at the top of the Metro League, one of the most competitive divisions in the state. With over 185 Metro titles and many recent state titles, our athletes regularly continue their sport at the collegiate level. By offering at least two non cut sports every season, there is a way for every level athlete to get involved.

Regardless of our great results in competition, athlete's academics and safety come first! We are dedicated to fitness, safety protocols and prioritizing the "student" in all of our student athletes.

Faith holds a prominent place at BBHS, permeating every aspect of our community. Special retreats are organized throughout the year, providing students with dedicated time for spiritual reflection and growth. These retreats offer an opportunity for students to deepen their relationship with God and strengthen their faith journey.

Serving the community is an integral part of the school's faith-centered philosophy. Students actively engage in various service projects, volunteering their time and talents to make a positive impact on those in need. Through these acts of service, students learn the importance of compassion, empathy, and the Christian call to love and serve others.

Time for prayer, reflection, and Masses are regularly scheduled into the school day to provide students with opportunities to gather as a faith community.
